The story:After the first Beast Wars two pods got stranded together 
without a place to go since the ships left without them.Hidden in a 
cave they sat there for a couple years when suddenly the inside of 
the pods startedto shine they both scanned that of a poisonious 
spider.After several minutes they finally emerged one brown and black 
spider and one scarlet and blue spider.The roamed around the world 
reeking havok everywhere they went needing a challenge the went back 
to the caves and waiting seeing the ships crash they finally decide 
to come out of hiding.....
                      Walking
Spider Demon:Ahhh finally something new to torment.
Scarlet Spider:Yes maybe I can finally get to use al of my skills 
against a foe.Hmmm I wonder if these newcomers will be tasty?
Spider Demon:Sure why wouldn't they?I hope they are others like us so 
we actually have a little bit of a challenge.
Scarlet Spider:Hmmm yes but i should warn you don't underestimate the 
newcomers.I always have to tell you never underestimate your opponent.
Spider Demon:I don't underestimate them I'm just really confident and 
you are confident and cocky but yet you tell me this.
Scarlet Spider:That maybe but I still make sure I don't let my 
cockiness get to me.I also know when to shut up as well.
        Seeing a bot getting fired upon by others(Predacon Base)  
Scarlet Spider:Hmmm that's nice some of us and look that one is 
fighting by himself.
Spider Demon:Yes I say we join in so we can have a treat.
Scarlet Spider:Now we will after awhile until then let's just see 
what happens.
         Stands by a Predacon
Spider Demon:I wonder wht's happening here?
Scarlet Spider:Yes I would like to know as well.
OOC:Can a Predacon tell them what's going on please I'd appreciate it 
thanks
